text: Eleanor Coen (October 21, 1916 - July 9, 2010)Eleanor Coen - New Deal Art MuseumEleanor Coen Education was an American painter. She was born in Normal, Illinois. Coen worked at the Art Institute of Chicago. Coen's work is displayed at the Smithsonian American Art Museum and Art Institute of Chicago.Collections: Coen, Eleanor, Art Institute of Chicago. Coen died of heart failure at the age of 93 in Evanston, Illinois. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:American painters Category:Artists from Illinois Category:People from Normal, Illinois
title: Eleanor Coen
